EmailTemplate.description: Email template sent to the external user to inform him that he needs to sign the ESN Policy before accessing Chatter. Link : http://pernod-ricard.force.com/EURPAGE/EXT_USR_RQT_SigningProcess?id={!External_User_Request__c.Id}
EmailTemplate.name: Email to the External User to sign the ESN Policy.
EmailTemplate.subject: Pernod Ricard Chatter® – External User Access Signature
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!External_User_Request__c.EXT_USR_RQT_First_Name__c} {!External_User_Request__c.EXT_USR_RQT_Last_Name__c},
You have been invited to use Pernod Ricard Chatter® by {!External_User_Request__c.CreatedBy} to share information within the group named : {!External_User_Request__c.EXT_USR_RQT_Group_Name__c}.
You’ll be granted access as soon as you have performed two actions :
1. Read, accept and sign the ESN Policy 2. Read, accept and sign the Non Disclosure Agreement
To perform those two actions, please follow this link :
http://pernod-ricard.force.com/EURPAGE/EXT_USR_RQT_SigningProcess?id={!External_User_Request__c.Id}
Best regards,
Pernod Ricard Chatter® Team
